bibl.title: Did Rome Engage in Pearling in the Red Sea? A Re-examination of the Two Dedications by Publius Iuventius Agathopus.
bibl.note: Rome's craving for pearls. - Publius Iuventius Rufus, the (ἀρχι)μεταλλάρχης [I. Pan 51 and I. Koptos 41]. - Iuventius Rufus, the supervisor of pearl fisheries. - Objections. - The so-called land-pearl (χερσαῖος μαργαρίτης). - Back to Iuventius Rufus.
bibl.seg: Pierre Schneider, Did Rome Engage in Pearling in the Red Sea? A Re-examination of the Two Dedications by Publius Iuventius Agathopus.

Rome's craving for pearls. - Publius Iuventius Rufus, the (ἀρχι)μεταλλάρχης [I. Pan 51 and I. Koptos 41]. - Iuventius Rufus, the supervisor of pearl fisheries. - Objections. - The so-called land-pearl (χερσαῖος μαργαρίτης). - Back to Iuventius Rufus.
